item.title: 常用软件工具
item.description: git monit cicd autorun k3s k8s Kubernetes-ui gitlab zabbix jekins ansible ranche kubeoperator kubepi gogs prometheus gopub saltstack kubekey kuboard gotea nagios gokins eggo kuboard-spray monit 名称 链接地址 zabbix prometheus nagios 若对你有帮助，不介意打赏一下 支付宝-zhifubao 微信-wechat
